\- All Accommodations Included

\- VIP Hotel Check-In

\- Guided By The Windy City Staff

\- Chase Vehicle

\- Private Parties

\- Free Commemorative Item

\- Return Motorcycle Shipping

## Rental Motorcycles

Want to take a tour on the latest and greatest Harley-Davidson technology? We
have a fleet of rental bikes! **Contact us** for more information and rental
rates.

## Tour Testimonials

> The attention to detail, safety and patience keeping such a large group
> engaged with the daily grind was aw inspiring. The planning for lodging,
> roads to travel left me truly fulfilled on the Sturgis trip 2022. Everything
> I have ever read or seen about the South Dakota experience we saw, heard,
> smelled and participated. The riders in our group were so much fun to be
> around. Sharing the experience together of roads traveled for 9 days will
> always be remembered fondly and not  
> forgotten anytime soon.
>
> Lair

> The tour was great, we started off not knowing anyone, and left with many
> new friends. All my years & miles of riding I have never done such a ride
> like that. The views of the dams were amazing, we all certainly got our
> steps in. The hanging out at the hotels and the conversations were great.
>
> Ron Sodko

> I loved this tour! Although I have ridden my bike in all 48 continental
> states, I have never experienced the beauty that is the waterfalls of the
> UP! The routes were very well planned to ensure we saw some of the best
> waterfalls in the area without over doing it or feeling overly rushed.
> Obviously great care was taken into the planning and execution. The ride
> itself was very safe and I appreciate your attention to consistency and
> safety by ensuring you communicate clearly that you do the speed limit, that
> you accelerate gradually to limit rubber banding, and you continue to
> reinforce the proper spacing of bikes. All led to a very safe ride for all!
>
> Caryl Lumpp

> This year was my fourth Sturgis trip with your tour group and add in the
> Washington DC trip, all trips have been great.
>
> James Wizniak

> Rhonda and I had a blast. The route, weather, chase vehicle and trailer, and
> company was terrific. Your knowledge and obvious expertise were well
> appreciated. The accommodations were great as was the parking for the bikes.
> The serene visits to all the waterfalls were especially enjoyed following
> hours of Harley exhaust melodies.
>
> Hal & Rhonda Norman

> We had a great time! The winding roads and scenery were amazing! Everybody
> was a lot of fun!
>
> Cassie Nimerfroh

> We booked our first Motorcycle tour with Mike and Kari the Trip around Lake
> Michigan! Beautiful routes. Very well planned out. A nice group of people
> that are now our new Harley family. We will definitely book another tour
> with Mike! Great memories!
>
> Debbie Sammons Howie

> Sturgis 2018, my first trip, had a great time, Mike Papp kept us on
> schedule, he did a great job and Ronnie was quick to care of all of all your
> needs, Don ran Clean up, also did a great job. A great crowd of riders,
> everyone was quick to help each other out and welcoming to make friends. I
> went into this trip knowing absolutely no one and made lots of friends . I
> would highly recommend Windy City tours.
>
> Chris Ponce

> We just retuned from the Windy City Motorcycle Lake Michigan Tour. My wife
> and I have traveled all over the world and this trip was without a doubt the
> best time we had. Jeff and Mike were outstanding and safe tour leaders. The
> hotels and food were great. The people in our group were all terrific. We
> are looking forward to our next Windy City Tour.
>
> Steve and Marge Anzalone
